firstNightReminder: Point to a player who neighbors an evil player.
name: Drink Cart Pusher
ability: You start knowing 1 player who neighbors an Evil player.

firstNightReminder: Show the character token of an in-play character who neighbors an evil player.
name: Baggage Checker
ability: You start knowing 1 good character who neighbors an Evil player.

firstNightReminder: The Ticket-Taker points to a player. Check if that player has a "Ticket" reminder token. If they do, nod your head yes. If they do not, nod your head no.
otherNightReminder: The Ticket-Taker points to a player. Check if that player has a "Ticket" reminder token. If they do, nod your head yes. If they do not, nod your head no.
name: Ticket-Taker
ability: Half of the good players unknowingly start the game with a ticket. Each night, choose a player: learn if they have a ticket.

otherNightReminder: If the Conductor nominated first, show the head signal (nod "yes", shake "no") for whether they nominated a Townsfolk. Remove the "Nominated Townsfolk" or "Not Townsfolk" token.
name: Conductor
ability: Each night*, if you nominated first today, you learn if you nominated a Townsfolk.

otherNightReminder: If the Conductor nominated first or the Conductor is dead and the Secondman nominated first, show the head signal (nod "yes", shake "no") for whether they nominated a Townsfolk. Remove the "Nominated Townsfolk" or "Not Townsfolk" token if necessary.
name: Secondman
ability: Each night*, if the Conductor nominated first today, learn if they nominated a Townsfolk. If there is no alive Conductor, you have their power. [+Conductor]

firstNightReminder: When a player picks the Insomniac, place the "Picked Insomniac" token next to them or, if it is already next to another player, leave it where it is. If a player has the "Picked Insomniac" token, show their character token to the Insomniac. Remove the "Picked Insomniac" token.
otherNightReminder: When a player picks the Insomniac, place the "Picked Insomniac" token next to them or, if it is already next to another player, leave it where it is. If a player has the "Picked Insomniac" token, show their character token to the Insomniac. Remove the "Picked Insomniac" token.
name: Insomniac
ability: Each night, learn a character that chose you tonight.

firstNightReminder: The Lone Gun points to a player. Place "Aimed At" next to that player. Later tonight, if that player chooses the Lone Gun, that player dies.
otherNightReminder: Remove the previously placed "Aimed At" token. The Lone Gun points to a player. Place "Aimed At" next to that player. Later tonight, if that player chooses the Lone Gun, that player dies.
name: Lone Gun
ability: Each night*, choose a player: if they choose you tonight for any reason, they die.

otherNightReminder: If the player with "Nominated" was executed, place "Drunk" next to the Speculator and a nearest alive Evil player.
name: Speculator
ability: If the player you nominate is executed, you & a nearest alive Evil neighbor are drunk tonight & tomorrow until dusk.

otherNightReminder: The Marshal picks either left or right. Put "Protected" markers next to 1, 2, or 3 consecutive alive players in that direction.
name: Marshal
ability: Each night*, pick a direction. The 1, 2, or 3 alive players in that direction cannot die tonight.

otherNightReminder: The Deputy picks a player. Place the "Must Pick Deputy" token next to that player. If that player wakes later and must choose a player, show the "You've been affected by" card and the Deputy character token. If they pick additional players, they may continue to pick them, but will receive a shake "no" if they repick the Deputy. Act as if the Deputy was their first pick.
name: Deputy
ability: Each night*, choose a player: if they choose players tonight, they automatically choose you as their first choice.

otherNightReminder: The previously safe player is no longer safe. The Bodyguard picks a player. Place the "Safe from Neighbors" token next to that player.
name: Bodyguard
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they are safe from their neighbors tonight.

otherNightReminder: Any previously "Drunk" players are no longer drunk. The Old Coot picks two players. If either is a Minion, place a "Drunk" token next to each.
name: Old Coot
ability: Each night*, choose two players (not yourself): if either is a Minion, both are drunk tonight.

firstNightReminder: The Snoop picks a player. Nod "yes" or shake "no" to indicate if that player's neighbors are on the same team.
otherNightReminder: The Snoop picks a player. Nod "yes" or shake "no" to indicate if that player's neighbors are on the same team.
name: Snoop
ability: Each night, choose a player: you learn if their neighbors are both on the same team.

name: Nuisance
ability: When your neighbor chooses a player for any reason, you may be chosen instead.

name: Confidante
ability: You cannot nominate or vote for your alive neighbors, even if drunk or poisoned.

otherNightReminder: If an alive neighbor dies, place a reminder token opposite the Yellow-belly's current alignment. If they have a token at dusk, indicate their new team. Remove the token.
name: Yellow-belly
ability: When an alive neighbor dies, you swap your alignment at Dawn.

firstNightReminder: Show a Demon a character token of one of the Signaller's alive neighbors.
otherNightReminder: Show a Demon a character token of one of the Signaller's alive neighbors.
name: Signaller
ability: Each night, the demon learns the character of one of your closest neighbouring alive Townsfolk.

otherNightReminder: The Caboose chooses a player. If that player was chosen by the Demon tonight, have them pick another player. That player dies.
name: Caboose
ability: Each night*, choose a player: if the Demon also chose them, choose another player: they die. You act last at night.

name: Switch
ability: If the Demon kills your alive neighbor, another alive neighbor dies as well.

firstNightReminder: The Coupler picks a player. If that player is an Outsider, place the "Coupled" token next to them.
otherNightReminder: Remove any "Coupled" token. The Coupler picks a player. If that player is an Outsider, place the "Coupled" token next to them.
name: Coupler
ability: Each night, choose a player: if they are an Outsider and the Demon is executed tomorrow, they become evil and swap characters with the Demon. [+1 Outsider]

name: Whistle
ability: If a player chooses you at night, they die at dawn.

otherNightReminder: The Boiler picks a player. Wake that player and show them "This character selected you" and the Boiler token. They choose either themselves or their alive neighbor. If they chose a Good player, that player dies. If they chose an Evil player, then the player chosen by the Boiler dies along with both of their alive neighbors.
name: Boiler
ability: Each night*, choose a player. They choose 1 of their alive neighbors to die. If they choose an Evil player, then they die along with all their alive neighbors.

otherNightReminder: The Coal Engine picks a player. The player dies. If that player wakes at night, show their character token to the Coal Engine. They may use that power.
name: Coal Engine
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. If they have a night action, you learn what it is & may use it.

firstNightReminder: Smokestack chooses a player. If they choose another player, place the "Poisoned" token next to that player. If they choose themselves, all Smokestack "Poisoned" players die. Remove all "Poisoned" tokens.
otherNightReminder: Smokestack chooses a player. If they choose another player, place the "Poisoned" token next to that player. If they choose themselves, all Smokestack "Poisoned" players die. Remove all "Poisoned" tokens.
name: Smokestack
ability: Each night, choose a player; they are poisoned. If you choose yourself, your previously poisoned players die instead.

otherNightReminder: Place all Momentum "Dead" tokens from characters in the middle of the Grimoire, plus one. The Momentum must choose that many players (they are not told how many they get to pick until they are put to sleep): all die. Any that do not die have their "Dead" tokens immediately removed.
name: Momentum
ability: Each night*, choose a number of players that is 1 more than you killed the previous night: they die.
